name: BIM Services India
tag_list: bim-services, bim-modeling-services, architectural-modeling-services, structura-bim-services, mep-services, architectural-bim-services, structural-steel-detailing, clash-detection-services, construction-drawings, family-content-creation-services, building
overview:
BIM Services is a leading Building Information Modeling firm based in India. We provide cost-effective, Wide-ranging and Detailed BIM Modeling Services to our Clients spread across US, Canada, Europe and Australia. Our clients primarily include Architects, Builders, Construction Companies Contractors and Fabricators. Outsourcing Building Information Modeling requirements to us will enable the client to concentrate on the core proficiency and construction processes entirely. BIM Services was established in the year 2009 by qualified and skilled team of Engineers and Architects with an experience of more than a decade in Engineering Industry. We have effectually brought Experts with distinct experience in design and development of Buildings. Our projects facilitate companies to successfully implement and integrate BIM Modeling with their construction stages, which in turn helps client save considerable cost and time. We provide following Building Information Modeling Services:

• Architectural BIM BIM Services India offers top-notch Architectural Modeling services inclusive of CAD to BIM Conversion, Cost Estimation, BIM Construction Drawings, Parametric Family Creation, etc at affordable prices. Our Revit BIM Modelers have significant amount of experience in handling various international projects based on Architectural BIM services. For further information Visit: http://www.bimservicesindia.com/architectural-bim/

• Structural BIM We offer high-end Structural Modeling Services to clients worldwide. Our BIM Modelers are well-versed with various international codes and standards essential to execute BIM Modeling Services. Our Services includes Structural Analysis, Rebar Detailing, Clash Detection, Structural Families, Construction Drawings, etc. Visit: http://www.bimservicesindia.com/structural-bim/ for more details • MEP Services We provide remarkable, Cost-effective and time-bound MEP Services to clientele globally. We are equipped with various advanced software’s and tools required for executing accurate MEP Services. Our Services incorporates HVAC BIM services, Electrical BIM Services, Mechanical Modeling Services, Plumbing BIM Services, Clash Detection services, Family Content Creation Services, etc. For more Details visit: http://www.bimservicesindia.com/mep-services/

BIM projects we executed ranges from Preliminary 3D BIM to 4D as well as 5D BIM projects. We develop models, extract Drawings and further employ it for construction requirements, execute clash detection and co-ordinate checking services and BOQ together with integration of various services such as Building Information Facility Management, Cloud Scanning or Point BIM, etc and fields into one. Our strengths are our in depth knowledge pertaining to International Construction and Building Standards. We provide all types of BIM Services right from Conceptualization, Development to utmost Building Information Modeling.

For Further information visit: http://www.bimservicesindia.com/
